Detailed Description

PhysicsTools/LiteAnalysis/src/kit.cc

Description: A class of utilities. These functions are placed in a class so that Reflex can handle overloading automatically. This is just a collection of boilderplate code, written over the years, to lessen clutter.

Implementation: As simple as possible

PhysicsTools/FWLiteAnalysis/src/kit.cc

Description: A class of Root utilities. These functions are placed in a class so that Reflex can handle overloading automatically. This is just a collection of simple boilerplate code to lessen clutter that I've written over the years.

Implementation: As simple as possible
